channel.title: Fletching... Interface/skill help
channel.description:
alright so i have a base for my fletching skill
--what i need is the interface that pops up that show short or long bow... and be able to fletch either one based on you click
any help is accepted:D

item.title: Fletching... Interface/skill help

item.description:
@sh1pwr3ck wrote:

this isnt really help but… if ur fletching is slow xp then u need tht but if its fast like 10min -1 min to 99… then u can just make a knife used on a log to make a longbow

most people no the requirments
